job description:
Description:Component level signature analysis, component and air vehicle level test and evaluation execution, production line and sustainment affordability / availability improvement project plan execution from a Signature Integration perspective, production line and field non-conformance disposition coordination for Signature Integration Team. Radio Frequency Special test equipment use on site, US sites and at international locations. US and International travel likely. Although normal shift hours are specified, sporadic weekend and alternate shift work flexibility required to support production line and field operations.

MUST BE A US CITIZEN . SECRET CLEARANCE REQUIRED.
Basic Qualifications:
Experience with Windows/Linux/Unix and MS Office.
Bachelors degree required.
Experience working with projects or programs.
Desired Skills:
Matlab experience desired. Entry level Low Observables experience desired. Degreed Electrical Engineering, Mechanical, Physics candidates desired.
Java experience.
Experience using GUI.
Experience working within data analytics and statics.
BASIC QUALIFICATIONS:
